issue.title: timesofindia.indiatimes.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

issue.title: rtrings.com
issue.body:

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

4.7

Missed analytics or tracker

issue.title: open.spotify.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://open.spotify.com/playlist/30ItA1hHyulAM5zsJnQuL4](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2Fplaylist%2F30ItA1hHyulAM5zsJnQuL4) ### Comment > on spotify, the ad will not play and cannot be skipped. Adguard used to just block ads, now it blocks their content, not their existence. The ads are there, but they can't be played or skipped. I have to close the browser and restart spotify to escape the loop. ### Screenshots

issue.body:

issue.title: rutracker.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://rutracker.org/forum/index.php](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frutracker.org%2Fforum%2Findex.php) ### Comment > (Russian below) > - search from the main page doesn't work > - if pasting the link with search terms directly in address bar, the search result don't load > - hidden text doesn't show on pages > - in general the website works slowly > - (!) pausing Adguard on the website doesn't help, only quitting the app helps. > > == > - не работает поиск с главной страницы > - если скопировать ссылку с поиском в адресную строку то все равно поиск не работает, результаты не грузятся > - текст под катом не открывается > - в целом сайт работает очень медленно > - (!) не помогает даже добавить сайт в вайтлист, помогает только полностью выйти из приложения. > > Помогите пожалуйста :( Username: `@linthout` ### Screenshots

issue.title: Google Play: com.instagram.lite
